select A.project_code, A.title, A.content, B.nickname, C.original_name, C.save_path, C.saved_name, C.file_type, C.thumbnail_path, C.whether_deleted, C.update_date
from project A join user_info B on A.user_code = B.user_code left join project_files C on A.project_code = C.project_code order by project_code
